result.name: residential-approvals-dashboard
result.notes:
This dashboard provides details of residential approvals from the [Planning London Datahub](https://www.london.gov.uk/programmes-strategies/planning/digital-planning/planning-london-datahub) (PLD). Data on the datahub is data that is supplied by applicants and Planning Authorities. Due to the nature of how it is collected and assimilated, it is not checked for quality as it is received, and as such may require to be amended as data quality reviews are completed and specific analysis highlights deficiencies. Boroughs supply starts and completions data on an annual basis.

This report contains multiple pages. To move between pages, the navigation is at the bottom of the report.

We are currently running a data improvement program, increasing the availability and quality of the data. If you are looking to use this data for analysis please review the core data for any error before relying on it.

Other residential dashboards from the Planning London Datahub:

*   [Residential commencements](https://data.london.gov.uk/dataset/residential-starts-dashboard)
*   [Residential completions](https://data.london.gov.uk/dataset/residential-completions-dashboard)
*   [Residential pipeline](https://data.london.gov.uk/dataset/residential-pipeline-dashboard)
result.title: Residential approvals dashboard
